caption.p: (a) Schematic representation of the hypothesized relation between present day P – ET and its future change Δ(P − ET). (b) Pearson correlation across models of (P − ET) ref with Δ(P − ET). (c) Pearson correlations across models of P ref with Δ(P − ET). Here Δ(P − ET) is the difference between the means of periods 2071–2100 and 1976–2005. P = precipitation; ET = evapotranspiration.
